issue.title: [Java] All static initializers should catch and report exceptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17113](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17113). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As reported on the mailing list: https://lists.apache.org/thread/gysn25gsm4v1fvvx9l0sjyr627xy7q65

All static initializers should catch and report exceptions, or else they will get swallowed by the JVM.
